title: Delete character
content:
The delete character interface is a modal sub-interface that can be opened in the delete interface by clicking the trash bin icon next to a player character.

It allows the player to delete a player character, and to navigate back to the delete interface. This requires confirmation by entering the requested phrase into an input box, after which there is a 60-minute timer before the player character is deleted. Before the 60 minutes have passed, the player can cancel the deletion from the choose a slot interface.
